Onboarding Guide¶

Welcome to the TPM Job Finder POC! This guide will help you get started with development, testing, and deployment.

## Setup - Clone the repository - Install Python 3.11+ - Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt - Configure environment variables and secrets as described in the main README

## Running Tests - Run all tests: PYTHONPATH=. pytest - Coverage is reported automatically in CI

## Adding New Services - Place new service code in its own folder under src/ - Add tests in the corresponding tests/ folder - Update documentation in docs/

## Contributing - Follow code style and linting rules (ruff) - Write tests for new features - Update onboarding and config docs as needed
